import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { NgForm } from '@angular/forms'; import { AuthService } from '../auth/auth.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-register', templateUrl: './register.component.html', styleUrls: ['./register.component.scss'], }) export class RegisterComponent implements OnInit { isLoading = false; errorMessage = undefined; constructor(private authSrv: AuthService, private router: Router) {} ngOnInit(): void {} async onSubmit(form: NgForm) { this.isLoading = true; console.log(form); try { await this.authSrv.signup(form.value).subscribe(res => console.log(res)); form.reset(); this.isLoading = false; this.errorMessage = undefined; this.router.navigate(['/']); } catch (error: any) { this.isLoading = false; this.errorMessage = error; console.error(error); } } }
